Text:
Brutal Legend Update 14 (c) Double Fine Productions

 05/2013 :..... RELEASE.DATE .. PROTECTION .......: Steam
 67x50 :.......... DISC(S) .. GAME.TYPE ........: Action

 Update 14

 - UI Fixes to the multiplayer lobber where you could not change factions
 - Render optimizations
 - Fixed a bug where the stage would disappear in the Sea of Black tears
 - Matchmaking improvements

 1. Unrar
 2. Install the update to your game dir. Overwrite existing when asked
 Previous Updates are required to be installed
 3. Copy the content from /Crack directory to the
 install directory of the game, overwriting the existing
 files
 4. Play the game
 5. Support the software developers. If you like this game, BUY IT
do i really need all previous updates??? is like 10 niggabytes bro!! more than the fucking game itself  !!!
AVG warns on steam_api.dll - possibly false positive (AVG does that a lot) but how would I know? :(
